data: an adrenaline-filled game inspired by the classic Street Fighter series, where players can unleash their special fireball moves, execute intricate combos, skillfully block and dodge enemy attacks.

In the gripping and radioactive underground world of 'Empire Uprising: Fight for the Crown', a resilient peasant defies the odds to challenge a mighty king, with each player harnessing unique abilities and powerful moves

propel into a strategic whirlwind of an arcade racing experience where players meticulously plan their moves turn by turn, harness high-octane power-ups, and conquer race tracks while surviving heart-stopping crashes
dive into a thrilling 2-player arcade fight-off, juggling between time-riding Abe Lincoln and a medley of peculiar opponents including a future robot, an aggressive Uno card, and a shrewd Ninja.
Escape from an unknown alien planet with nothing but your feet and laser. Avoid terrifying beasts, solve challenging physics puzzles along your way to freedom

In this thrilling platformer, players wield the power to shift gravity at will, hunt for elusive keys, confront a final boss whose motives are suspiciously ambiguous, and brave the infernal depths of hell itself.
T. Battaglia + M. Braun + N. Costa Jorge + S. McGuinness
R. Ermers + J.Y. Kim + E. Plank
A. Frontczak + H. Mollenkramer + K. Sinha
